competition_summary.context: competition and rapid technological change in our industry; ▪ the significant long-term and inherently risky investments we are making in R&D and manufacturing facilities that may not realize a favorable return; ▪ the complexities and uncertainties in developing and implementing new semiconductor products and manufacturing process technologies; ▪ our ability to time and scale our capital investments appropriately and successfully secure favorable alternative financing arrangements and government
